colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SPYANG GI GNOD CHEN LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS BYAMS LA SNYING RJE SEMS BSKYED LAS MAH'A K'A LAS SKU'I SPRUL SKU @005B GSUM SKYES SHES PA RIN CHE BLA MA BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^AER TE NI CHOS RJE BDUN SKYES SHES SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING ZHAL GZIGS GIS BRGYUD BLA MA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DON RTA PHYUGS RNAMS LA SPYANG GI GNOD PA MANG PO'I PHYIR DU KHRO BO CHEN POS DON ZHES BYA BA SHIN TU BRNYED DKA' SMAD DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BAB BRTAN NO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,RGYAL PO YUL 'KHOR BSRUNG SHAR PHYOGS DRI ZA'I GNOD PA ZHI BAR GYUR CIG ,)
